Create certificate of attendance

Source: R/certificate_attendance.R
create_certificate_attendance.Rd

Create certificate of attendance

Usage

create_certificate_attendance(
  data = NULL,
  path = NULL,
  language = "english",
  type = NULL,
  title = NULL,
  organiser = NULL,
  hours = NULL,
  signer = NULL,
  signer.position = NULL,
  date = NULL,
  speaker = NULL,
  lpic = NULL,
  rpic = NULL,
  signature.pic = NULL,
  name.column = NULL
)

Arguments

data

a data frame to create attendance certificates.

path

Folder path where the output will be printed

language

Select english or spanish

type

Type of event (conference, workshop, seminar...)

title

Title of the event

organiser

Name of the organizing entity

hours

Number of hours the event has lasted

signer

Person who credits the certificate

signer.position

Position of the signer

date

Date of the event

speaker

Name of the speaker of the event

lpic

PNG object. File route of the top-left image. Can be blank if set to NULL.

rpic

PNG object. File route of the top-right image. Can be blank if set to NULL.

signature.pic

PNG object. File route of a signature image. Can be blank if set to NULL.

name.column

Column name of the Google Sheet column which specifies the attendee's name.

Value

An 'output' folder with the PDF documents inside

Author

Julia G. de Aledo, Ignacio Ramos-Gutierrez

Examples

if (FALSE) {
create_certificate_attendance(
data= read_sheet('https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/
        d/1inkk3_oNvvt8ajdK4wOkSgPoUyE8JzENrZgSTFJEFBw/edit#gid=0'),
path = "LabeleR_output",
language="en",
type="class",
title="Potions Class",
organiser="Hogwarts School year 1992-1993",
signer="A.P.W.B. Dumbledore",
signer.position="School Headmaster",
hours=200,
date="01/01/2021",
speaker="Severus Snape",
rpic=NULL,
lpic=NULL,
signature.pic=NULL,
name.column="List_assistants"
)
}
